mapper.sql: select id, parent_id, menu_name, menu_type, path, icon, component, perms, is_frame, is_hidden, is_disable, order_num, create_time, update_time from t_menu
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.menu_type, m.path, m.icon, m.component, m.is_hidden FROM t_menu m where m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.is_disable = 0 order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.menu_type, m.path, m.icon, m.component, m.perms, m.is_frame, m.is_hidden, m.is_disable, m.order_num, m.create_time, m.update_time FROM t_menu m INNER JOIN t_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id INNER JOIN t_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id INNER JOIN t_role r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') AND m.is_disable = 0 AND r.is_disable = 0 AND ur.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT DISTINCT m.perms FROM t_menu m WHERE m.is_disable = 0
SELECT DISTINCT m.perms FROM t_menu m INNER JOIN t_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id WHERE rm.role_id = #{roleId} AND m.is_disable = 0
